page.title: 08THE VILLAGE OF LIFF (CONT)
page.content: The village used to boast of having a Brewery,Bakery,Joinery,Cobblers and Post Office but as so often happens in a rural community these facilities have disappeared. There are no amenities whatsoever in the village and the nearest shopping area is approx.2km away in the village of Muirhead. The population of the village is around 300 a large proportion of whom are old age pensioners. There are many magnificent views to be seen in this area especially during winter time. In harmony with the general landscape there are many fields,growing the type of crops that have already been mentioned on previous pages.
